metadata.title: CVE-2022-3078 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.16-rc6. There is alack of check after calling vzalloc() and lack of free after allocation indrivers/media/test-drivers/vidtv/vidtv_s302m.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3078` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1007-oracle - 5.15.0-1007.9~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1021-aws-fips - 5.4.0-1021.21+fips2
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-5.4.0-1021-aws-fips - 5.4.0-1021.21+fips2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1022-azure-fips - 5.4.0-1022.22+fips1
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-5.4.0-1022-azure-fips - 5.4.0-1022.22+fips1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1021-gcp-fips - 5.4.0-1021.21+fips1
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-5.4.0-1021-gcp-fips - 5.4.0-1021.21+fips1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1003-gkeop - 5.15.0-1003.5~20.04.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1033-ibm - 5.15.0-1033.36~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1001-iot - 5.4.0-1001.3
No subscription required

linux-image-5.4.0-1020-xilinx-zynqmp - 5.4.0-1020.24
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux-oracle-5.15 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1007.9~20.04.1').
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1021.21+fips2').
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1022.22+fips1').
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1021.21+fips1').
linux-gkeop-5.15 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1003.5~20.04.2').
linux-ibm-5.15 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1033.36~20.04.1').
linux-iot package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1001.3').
linux-xilinx-zynqmp package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1020.24').
